titleStmt.title: A replie to a person of honour, his pretended answer to the vindication of the Protestant religion in the point of obedience to soveraigns and to the book of papal tyranny by Peter Du Moulin ...
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.

notesStmt.note: A reply to Henry Janson's Philanax anglicus.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
